meanings.definition: A person who climbs or explores steep, rugged cliffs or rocks.
meanings.sent1: The brave cragsman scaled the rocky cliff with ease.
meanings.sent2: The experienced cragsman guided the group safely through the treacherous terrain.
meanings.sent3: The cragsman joked that he felt more at home on the cliff than on solid ground.
meanings.sent4: She was a cragsman in her own right, navigating the challenges of life like a rocky ascent.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cragsman clinging to the sheer rock face was etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: A skilled or experienced climber of crags or rocky terrain.
meanings.sent1: The young cragsman learned to read the cliffs like a book, anticipating every move.
meanings.sent2: The cragsman's expertise was evident as he effortlessly conquered the challenging route.
meanings.sent3: The cragsman playfully challenged his friends to a race up the steep hill.
meanings.sent4: Her determination made her a cragsman in the world of problem-solving, always finding a way up.
meanings.sent5: The cragsman's passion for climbing was contagious, inspiring others to reach new heights.
